recalculateSpeed() - Method in class Characters.PiranhaPlant

removeCharacter(Character) - Method in class Game.Area
Is used to "kill" a Character, it actually just makes it invisible and not solid to avoid Errors

Is used to "destroy" an Item, it actually just makes it invisible and not solid to avoid Errors
